description: This file defines and exports functions to interact with AWS API Gateway endpoints related to video resources. It includes utility functions to normalize API base URLs, fetch lists of videos, fetch individual videos by key, and upload videos with optional metadata. The functions utilize fetch API for network requests and handle JSON and multipart/form-data payloads.
external_files: none (depends on environment variables and fetch API)

methods.name: normalizeBase(input)
methods.description: Converts ARN or URL input into a proper HTTPS URL for API access.

methods.name: listVideos()
methods.description: Fetches and returns a list of videos from the API Gateway.

methods.name: getVideoByKey(videoKey)
methods.description: Fetches a single video by its key (path-encoded) from the API Gateway.

methods.name: uploadVideo({ file, title, description, competitionId, competitionName })
methods.description: Uploads a video, either via multipart form data or JSON, with optional metadata such as title, description, and competition info.

ctags.name: AWS_API_BASE
ctags.pattern: /^const AWS_API_BASE = process.env.REACT_APP_AWS_API_BASE || ''; \/\/ PUBLIC: must be set by user /

ctags.name: uploadVideo
ctags.pattern: /^export async function uploadVideo({ file, title, description, competitionId, competitionName }) /
